title: The Starry Night
description: A swirling night sky over a quiet village with a prominent church spire

title: The Scream
description: An agonized figure against a landscape with a tumultuous orange sky

title: Water Lilies
description: Serene pond surface with floating water lilies in soft, peaceful colors

title: The Persistence of Memory
description: Surreal landscape with melting clocks draped over objects

title: Sunflowers
description: Vibrant yellow sunflowers in a vase, radiating warmth and joy

title: A Sunday Afternoon on the Island of La Grande Jatte
description: Lively scene of people enjoying a sunny day in the park

title: Guernica
description: Powerful anti-war painting depicting the bombing of Guernica

title: Saturn Devouring His Son
description: Dark and disturbing depiction of the god Saturn eating his child

title: The Night Café
description: Harsh interior of a café with clashing colors expressing tension

title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
description: Intimate portrait of a young woman glancing over her shoulder with an enigmatic expression

title: The Kiss
description: Ornate golden painting of two lovers embracing

title: The Garden of Earthly Delights
description: Complex triptych depicting paradise, earthly pleasures, and hell

title: The Birth of Venus
description: Venus emerging from the sea on a giant shell

title: Impression, Sunrise
description: Hazy harbor scene with orange sun reflecting on water

title: The Great Wave off Kanagawa
description: Dramatic wave threatening boats with Mount Fuji in background
